title: Individual responses to purple grape juice consumption on endurance, explosive power, and fatigue in young male elite soccer players.
abstract: Purple grape juice (PGJ), a natural carbohydrate- and polyphenol-rich supplement, may enhance exercise performance. This study, incorporating individual response analysis, examined the acute effects of PGJ ingestion on endurance, explosive power, and perceived fatigue in elite male soccer players.

POLYPHENOL: a natural carbohydrate- and polyphenol-rich supplement
